main.you_may_check_eligibility: You can verify your eligibility to vote from electoral list at Student Unions website ltky.fi
main.sign_in_using_university_account: Sign in using your account of Lappeenranta University of Technology.
main.voting_opening_hours: Voting is open between the 1st of November 2017 9.00am and the 8th of November 2017 at 15.00.

no_voting_right.title: No Voting Right
no_voting_right.lead: Your student number does not have a right to vote.
no_voting_right.body: Please contact the Central Electoral Commission in case of an error.

invalid_saml_response.title: Sign In Error
invalid_saml_response.lead: Cooperation with the authentication service failed.
invalid_saml_response.body: If the problem persists, please contact the Central Electoral Commission.

general.title: Unknown Error
general.lead: Something went wrong for an unknown reason.
general.body: If the problem persists, please contact the Central Electoral Commission.

error.lead: Your sign in link has expired or voting is closed.
error.private_browsing_note: Please check that your browser is not in Private Browsing Mode.

private_browsing_mode.title: You're in Private Browsing Mode
private_browsing_mode.lead: Your browser has "Private Browsing Mode" enabled, which prevents the voting service from functioning.
private_browsing_mode.what_now: Please open the sign in link in a normal browser window.

sign_up.voting_days_are: The voting is open between 9.00 on the 1st of November 2017 and 15.00 on the 8th of November 2017.
sign_up.voting_open_hours_are: Voting is open around the clock during the voting time.
sign_up.if_cannot_sign_in: If you cannot access your university user account or signing up fails for some reason, please contact the Central Electoral Commission {{ name }}, {{ email }}, {{ phone }}.
sign_up.sign_in_is_not_active: Voting is not open at the moment.

edari.eligibility: You have a voting right if your name is found in the electoral list and you are a member of the Student Union. You can sign up to vote by using your Lappeenranta University of Technology  user account.

request_link.password_instructions: If you experience problems, please contact vaalit[at]ltky.fi
request_link.in_case_of_fire: If you experience problems, please contact vaalit[at]ltky.fi

something_went_wrong.if_happens_again: If the problem happens again, please contact the Central Electoral Commission of the Student Union vaalit@ltky.fi +358 50 551 6147.
something_went_wrong.pls_explain: Please let us know the technical error message:

errors.not_eligible_in_any_election: You are not eligible in any of the current elections.
errors.session_creation_not_permitted: Voting is closed. You can view the date and time for voting above.

sign_out.ingress: You may close the browser window.

profile.ingress: You have signed in with the following information.
profile.you_are_eligible: You are eligible in the elections
profile.in_case_of_problem: If there is a problem with your information, please contact the Student Union.

error.try_again: Sign out and retry to signing in.

vote-ballot.title: Vote ballot
vote-ballot.ingress: Choose a candidate from the list.
vote-ballot.registration-note: Your vote is not registered until you press "Vote".
vote-ballot.about-to-change-existing-vote: You are about to change a previously cast vote. Change will be recorded after you click 'Vote'.

vote.coalition-index-text: Coalitions consist of alliances and alliances consist of candidates.
vote.if-you-are-eligible-in-others: If you are eligible in multiple elections,
vote.close-window-when-finished: You may close the browser window.

search.title: Find a candidate
search.browser-search-tip: You can also use browser's search.
search.when-no-results: Alliances, which did not match your search query, are not displayed.

elections.sign_up_please: You can vote after you have signed in.
elections.you_can_vote_in_the_following: You can vote in the following elections:
elections.choose_election: Open the election, choose a candidate and press "vote".
elections.submit_vote_help: Your vote will be registered when you press the "vote" button after choosing a candidate. You will asked to press the button again after the first press!
elections.vote_is_immutable: A cast vote cannot be changed afterwards.

empty.no_elections_available: You are not eligible to vote in any elections.

info.ingress: LTKY’s Representative Council elections are conducted to elect 27 members into the council, the highest decision-making body of the Student Union. All LTKY’s members, around 4,300 students at the Lappeenranta University of Technology, have the right to vote in the elections.
info.election_dates_explained: Election opens on the 1st of November 2017 at 9.00 and ends on the 8th of November 2017 at 15.00.

contact.in_case_of_fire: In case of a problem, please contact
